description: This file defines a mock class for the Dispatcher interface used in testing within a specific module of the project. It includes conditional compilation for different Dispatcher types and declares mocked methods for interface behavior.

classes.name: DispatcherMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the Dispatcher interface for testing purposes, with different interface implementations based on compilation flags.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments reference count for the mock object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements reference count for the mock object.

methods.name: QueryInterface
methods.description: Queries for a specific interface on the mock object.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the dispatcher with a service.

methods.name: Dropped
methods.description: Indicates a dropped connection or event (present in ILimitedDispatcher).

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a method on the dispatcher with different signatures depending on the interface.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token and method against parameters (in ILimitedDispatcher).

methods.name: Local
methods.description: Returns the local dispatcher instance (in ILimitedDispatcher).
